text: "Hard Habit to Break" is a 1984 song by Chicago. It is the second single from their 14th studio album Chicago 17 and went to number 3 in the United States and number 8 in the United Kingdom. It won a Grammy Award in 1985. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Chicago (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Hard Habit to Break
